section.heading: Penalties.
section.text: A person violating any of the provisions of § 36-202 shall be guilty of a misdemeanor punishable by a fine of not less than $100 nor more than $500, or by imprisonment for not less than 3 months nor more than 1 year, or by both such fine and imprisonment.

annoGroup.heading: Cross References
annoGroup.annotation: Deceptive imitation of goods, criminal penalty, see § 22-1502.
